description:
A native node.js-powered Bundler with integration with VS.NET extension + ASP.NET MVC. No build-time or runtime performance costs.
        
		Extremely fast and simple pure node.js/javascript solution to statically complie, minify and combine your websites .css, .less, .coffee and .js files into user-defined bundles. Supports configurable bundle settings providing ideal unminified output for development and combined minified .min.js and .min.css files optimal for deployment. Integrates with MVC. No .dlls, includes all soure code for all customizable build scripts. Self-contained, no dependencies required at run-time.        
        More info at: https://github.com/ServiceStack/Bundler
summary: CoffeeScript, JavaScript, Less, Sass, Css compiler, minifier and combiner for ASP.NET MVC websites.
title: Bundler: Compiles and Minifies your JS, CoffeeScript, Less, Sass, Css. Integrates with MVC + VS.NET
